item.title: Chinese Egg Plant With Garlic Sauce
item.description: Ingredients Serves: 6 3 tablespoons vegetable oil 4 Chinese eggplants, halved lengthways, then cut into 2cm slices 1 cup (250ml) water 1 tablespoon crushed dried red chilli flakes 3 garlic cloves 1 tablespoon white sugar 1 teaspoon cornflour 2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 tablespoons oyster sauce Method Preparation:10min Cook:15min Ready in:25min Heat the oil in a wok or frypan over high heat. Add the eggplant and stir the eggplant until soft, about 4 minutes.
